spells.name: Animate Dead
spells.material: a drop of blood, a piece of flesh, and a pinch of bone dust
spells.description: This spell creates an undead servant. Choose a pile of bones or a corpse of a Medium or Small humanoid within range. Your spell imbues the target with a foul mimicry of life, raising it as an undead creature. The target becomes a skeleton if you chose bones or a zombie if you chose a corpse.
spells.at_higher_levels: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, you animate or reassert control over two additional undead creatures for each slot level above 3rd.

spells.name: Aura of Vitality
spells.description: An aura radiates from you in a 30-foot Emanation for the duration. When you create the aura and at the start of each of your turns while it persists, you can restore 2d6 Hit Points to one creature in it (no action required). That creature can't regain Hit Points from this spell again until the start of your next turn.

spells.name: Beacon of Hope
spells.description: Choose any number of creatures within range. For the duration, each target has Advantage on Wisdom saving throws and Death Saving Throws and regains the maximum number of Hit Points possible from any healing.

spells.name: Bestow Curse
spells.description: You touch a creature, which must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or become cursed for the duration. Choose the nature of the curse from the options in the spell description.
curse_options: Disadvantage on ability checks and saving throws of one ability score
Disadvantage on attack rolls against you
Waste action on failed Wisdom save each turn
Your attacks deal extra 1d8 Necrotic damage
spells.at_higher_levels: 4th level: 10 minutes. 5th level: 8 hours. 7th level: 24 hours. 9th level: permanent until dispelled.

spells.name: Blinding Smite
spells.casting_time: Bonus Action, after hitting with a melee weapon
spells.description: Your strike flares with light. The target takes an extra 3d8 Radiant damage and must succeed on a Constitution saving throw or have the Blinded condition until the start of your next turn.
spells.at_higher_levels: The damage increases by 1d8 for each slot level above 3rd.

spells.name: Blink
spells.description: Roll 1d6 at the end of each of your turns for the duration. On a roll of 4-6, you vanish from your current plane of existence and appear in the Ethereal Plane. At the start of your next turn, you return to an unoccupied space of your choice within 10 feet of where you vanished.

spells.name: Call Lightning
spells.description: A storm cloud appears at a point within range. When you cast the spell, choose a point you can see under the cloud. A bolt of lightning flashes down, and each creature within 5 feet of that point must make a Dexterity saving throw, taking 3d10 Lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much on a success. On each of your turns, you can use your action to call down lightning again.
spells.at_higher_levels: The damage increases by 1d10 for each slot level above 3rd.

spells.name: Clairvoyance
spells.material: a focus worth 100+ GP, either a jeweled horn for hearing or a glass eye for seeing
spells.description: You create an invisible sensor within range in a location familiar to you or in an obvious location. The sensor remains stationary. When you cast the spell, choose seeing or hearing. You can use the chosen sense through the sensor.

spells.name: Conjure Animals
spells.description: You conjure nature spirits that take the form of a Large pack of spectral animals in an unoccupied space you can see. The pack is a creature that uses the Conjured Animals stat block. The pack disappears when it drops to 0 HP or the spell ends.
spells.notes_2024: 2024 version uses a stat block rather than summoning specific beasts.

spells.name: Conjure Barrage
spells.material: a weapon or piece of ammunition
spells.description: You brandish the weapon used to cast the spell and conjure similar spectral weapons that shoot forward and then disappear. Each creature in a 60-foot Cone originating from you makes a Dexterity saving throw, taking 5d8 Force damage on a failed save or half as much on a successful one.
spells.at_higher_levels: The damage increases by 1d8 for each slot level above 3rd.

spells.name: Counterspell
spells.casting_time: Reaction, when you see a creature within 60 feet casting a spell with Verbal, Somatic, or Material components
spells.description: You attempt to interrupt a creature in the process of casting a spell. The creature must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the spell dissipates with no effect, and the action, Bonus Action, or Reaction used to cast it is wasted. If that spell was cast with a spell slot, the slot isn't expended.
spells.notes_2024: 2024 version requires the target to make a Con save rather than automatic success based on slot level.

spells.name: Create Food and Water
spells.description: You create 45 pounds of food and 30 gallons of fresh water on the ground or in containers within range—enough to sustain up to fifteen humanoids or five steeds for 24 hours.

spells.name: Crusader's Mantle
spells.description: You radiate a magical aura in a 30-foot Emanation. While in the aura, you and your allies each deal an extra 1d4 Radiant damage when hitting with a weapon or an Unarmed Strike.

spells.name: Daylight
spells.description: For the duration, sunlight spreads from a point within range and fills a 60-foot-radius Sphere. The sunlight's area is Bright Light and sheds Dim Light for an additional 60 feet. Alternatively, cast on an object you're holding or one that isn't being worn or carried.

spells.name: Dispel Magic
spells.description: Choose one creature, object, or magical effect within range. Any ongoing spell of level 3 or lower ends. For spells of level 4 or higher, make an ability check using your spellcasting ability (DC 10 + spell's level). On a success, the spell ends.
spells.at_higher_levels: You automatically end spells of the slot level used or lower.

spells.name: Elemental Weapon
spells.description: A nonmagical weapon you touch becomes a magic weapon. Choose Acid, Cold, Fire, Lightning, or Thunder. For the duration, the weapon has a +1 bonus to attack rolls and deals an extra 1d4 damage of the chosen type.
spells.at_higher_levels: 5th-6th: +2 bonus and 2d4 extra. 7th+: +3 bonus and 3d4 extra.

spells.name: Enemies Abound
spells.description: You reach into the mind of one creature you can see and force it to make an Intelligence saving throw. On a failed save, the target loses the ability to distinguish friend from foe, regarding all creatures it can see as enemies.

spells.name: Erupting Earth
spells.description: Choose a point you can see on the ground within range. A fountain of churned earth and stone erupts in a 20-foot cube centered on that point. Each creature in that area must make a Dexterity saving throw, taking 3d12 Bludgeoning damage on a failed save, or half as much on a success. The ground in that area becomes Difficult Terrain.
spells.at_higher_levels: The damage increases by 1d12 for each slot level above 3rd.

spells.name: Fear
spells.description: Each creature in a 30-foot Cone must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or drop whatever it is holding and have the Frightened condition for the duration. A Frightened creature must take the Dash action and move away from you on each turn.

spells.name: Feign Death
spells.description: You touch a willing creature and put it into a cataleptic state that is indistinguishable from death. The target appears dead to all outward inspection and to spells used to determine the target's status.

spells.name: Fireball
spells.material: a ball of bat guano and sulfur
spells.description: A bright streak flashes from your pointing finger to a point you choose within range and then blossoms with a low roar into an explosion of flame. Each creature in a 20-foot-radius Sphere centered on that point makes a Dexterity saving throw, taking 8d6 Fire damage on a failed save or half as much on a successful one. The fire spreads around corners and ignites flammable objects that aren't being worn or carried.
spells.at_higher_levels: The damage increases by 1d6 for each slot level above 3rd.

spells.name: Fly
spells.description: You touch a willing creature. The target gains a Fly Speed of 60 feet for the duration. When the spell ends, the target falls if still aloft.
spells.at_higher_levels: You can target one additional creature for each slot level above 3rd.

spells.name: Gaseous Form
spells.description: You touch a willing creature and transform it, along with everything it's wearing and carrying, into a misty cloud. The target has a Fly Speed of 10 feet, can hover, and can pass through small holes and narrow openings.

spells.name: Glyph of Warding
spells.material: powdered diamond worth 200+ GP, which the spell consumes
spells.description: You inscribe a glyph that harms other creatures on a surface or within an object that can be closed. Choose Explosive Runes (5d8 damage in 20-foot sphere) or Spell Glyph (stores a spell of 3rd level or lower).
spells.at_higher_levels: Explosive Runes damage increases by 1d8. Spell Glyph can store higher-level spells.

spells.name: Haste
spells.description: Choose a willing creature you can see. Until the spell ends, the target's Speed is doubled, it gains a +2 bonus to AC, it has Advantage on Dexterity saving throws, and it gains an additional action on each of its turns. That action can be used only to take the Attack (one attack only), Dash, Disengage, Hide, or Use an Object action. When the spell ends, the target can't move or take actions until after its next turn.

spells.name: Hunger of Hadar
spells.description: You open a gateway to the void between the stars—a region infested with unknown horrors. A 20-foot-radius Sphere of blackness appears, filled with a cacophony of whispers. No light can illuminate it. Creatures that start their turn in the area take 2d6 Cold damage. Creatures that end their turn there must make a Dexterity save or take 2d6 Acid damage.

spells.name: Hypnotic Pattern
spells.description: You create a twisting pattern of colors in a 30-foot Cube within range. Each creature in the area who sees the pattern must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the creature has the Charmed condition and the Incapacitated condition for the duration. The effect ends for a creature if it takes damage or someone uses an action to shake it out of its stupor.

spells.name: Intellect Fortress
spells.description: Choose a willing creature you can see. Until the spell ends, the target has Resistance to Psychic damage and Advantage on Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma saving throws.
spells.at_higher_levels: You can target one additional creature for each slot level above 3rd.

spells.name: Leomund's Tiny Hut
spells.description: A 10-foot-radius immobile dome of force springs into existence around and above you. Nine creatures of Medium size or smaller can fit inside. The atmosphere inside is comfortable and dry. The dome is opaque from the outside, but creatures inside can see out.

spells.name: Lightning Bolt
spells.material: a bit of fur and a crystal rod
spells.description: A stroke of lightning forming a 100-foot-long, 5-foot-wide Line blasts out from you in a direction you choose. Each creature in the Line makes a Dexterity saving throw, taking 8d6 Lightning damage on a failed save or half as much on a successful one.
spells.at_higher_levels: The damage increases by 1d6 for each slot level above 3rd.

spells.name: Magic Circle
spells.material: salt and powdered silver worth 100+ GP, which the spell consumes
spells.description: You create a 10-foot-radius, 20-foot-tall Cylinder of magical energy. Choose one or more: Aberrations, Celestials, Elementals, Fey, Fiends, or Undead. The circle affects creatures of the chosen types. A creature can't willingly enter the cylinder and has Disadvantage on attacks against creatures within it.

spells.name: Major Image
spells.description: You create the image of an object, a creature, or some other visible phenomenon that is no larger than a 20-foot Cube. The image appears at a spot within range and lasts for the duration. It seems completely real, including sounds, smells, and temperature.
spells.at_higher_levels: At 6th level or higher, the spell lasts until dispelled without concentration.

spells.name: Mass Healing Word
spells.description: Up to six creatures of your choice within range regain Hit Points equal to 2d4 + your spellcasting ability modifier.
spells.at_higher_levels: The healing increases by 1d4 for each slot level above 3rd.

spells.name: Meld into Stone
spells.description: You step into a stone object or surface large enough to fully contain your body, melding yourself and all your equipment into the stone for the duration. You can cast spells on yourself while inside.

spells.name: Motivational Speech
spells.description: Choose up to five creatures within range. For the duration, each affected creature gains 5 Temporary Hit Points. Also, if an affected creature fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead. Once a creature uses this benefit, that creature can't do so again until it finishes a Short or Long Rest.
spells.at_higher_levels: Temporary Hit Points increase by 5 for each slot level above 3rd.

spells.name: Nondetection
spells.material: a pinch of diamond dust worth 25+ GP, which the spell consumes
spells.description: For the duration, you hide a target you touch from Divination spells. The target can be a willing creature, a place, or an object no larger than 10 feet in any dimension. The target can't be targeted by any Divination magic or perceived through magical scrying sensors.

spells.name: Phantom Steed
spells.description: A Large quasi-real, horselike creature appears on the ground in an unoccupied space of your choice within range. The creature uses the Riding Horse stat block but has a Speed of 100 feet and can travel 13 miles in an hour.

spells.name: Plant Growth
spells.description: If you cast this spell using 1 action, choose a point within range. All normal plants in a 100-foot-radius circle centered on that point become thick and overgrown. A creature moving through the area must spend 4 feet of movement for every 1 foot it moves. If you cast this spell over 8 hours, all plants in a half-mile radius become enriched for 1 year.

spells.name: Protection from Energy
spells.description: A willing creature you touch has Resistance to one damage type of your choice for the duration: Acid, Cold, Fire, Lightning, or Thunder.

spells.name: Remove Curse
spells.description: At your touch, all curses affecting one creature or object end. If the object is a cursed magic item, its curse remains, but the spell breaks its owner's Attunement to the object.

spells.name: Revivify
spells.material: diamonds worth 300+ GP, which the spell consumes
spells.description: You touch a creature that has died within the last minute. That creature revives with 1 Hit Point. This spell can't revive a creature that has died of old age, nor can it restore any missing body parts.

spells.name: Sending
spells.description: You send a short message of 25 words or fewer to a creature with which you are familiar. The creature hears the message, recognizes you as the sender if it knows you, and can answer in a like manner immediately.

spells.name: Sleet Storm
spells.description: Freezing rain and sleet fall in a 40-foot-tall, 20-foot-radius Cylinder. The area is Heavily Obscured and is Difficult Terrain. When a creature enters the area for the first time on a turn or starts its turn there, it must make a Dexterity saving throw or have the Prone condition.

spells.name: Slow
spells.description: Up to six creatures of your choice in a 40-foot Cube within range must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, an affected creature's Speed is halved, it takes a -2 penalty to AC and Dexterity saving throws, and it can't take Reactions. On its turn, it can take either an action or a bonus action, not both.

spells.name: Speak with Dead
spells.description: You grant the semblance of life to a corpse, allowing it to answer up to five questions. The corpse knows only what it knew in life and speaks only in languages it knew.

spells.name: Speak with Plants
spells.description: You imbue plants within 30 feet of you with limited sentience and animation, giving them the ability to communicate with you. You can question plants about events in the area within the past day.

spells.name: Spirit Guardians
spells.description: Protective spirits flit around you in a 15-foot Emanation for the duration. If you are good or neutral, their spectral form appears angelic or fey (your choice). If you are evil, they appear fiendish. When a creature enters the area for the first time on a turn or starts its turn there, it must make a Wisdom saving throw, taking 3d8 Radiant (or Necrotic if you're evil) damage on a failed save or half on a success. The area is Difficult Terrain for your enemies.
spells.at_higher_levels: The damage increases by 1d8 for each slot level above 3rd.

spells.name: Spirit Shroud
spells.description: You call forth spirits of the dead, which flit around you. Until the spell ends, any attack you make deals 1d8 extra Radiant, Necrotic, or Cold damage (your choice at casting). Any creature that takes this damage can't regain Hit Points until the start of your next turn. Any creature of your choice within 10 feet of you has its Speed reduced by 10 feet.
spells.at_higher_levels: The damage increases by 1d8 for every two slot levels above 3rd.

spells.name: Stinking Cloud
spells.description: You create a 20-foot-radius Sphere of yellow, nauseating gas centered on a point within range. The cloud is Heavily Obscured. Each creature wholly within the cloud at the start of its turn must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the creature spends its action on that turn retching.

spells.name: Summon Fey
spells.description: You call forth a spirit from the Feywild. It manifests in an unoccupied space you can see within range. The spirit uses the Fey Spirit stat block. When you cast this spell, choose a mood: Fuming, Mirthful, or Tricksy. The spirit resembles a fey creature of your choice marked by the mood.
spells.at_higher_levels: For each slot level above 3rd, the creature's AC increases by 1, Hit Points increase by 10, and damage increases by 1d6.

spells.name: Summon Lesser Demons
spells.material: a vial of blood from a humanoid killed within the past 24 hours
spells.description: You utter foul words, summoning demons from the chaos of the Abyss. Roll d6 to determine what appears. They are hostile to all creatures. On each of your turns, you can use a bonus action to issue verbal commands.

spells.name: Summon Shadowspawn
spells.material: tears inside a gem worth 300+ GP
spells.description: You call forth a shadowy spirit from the Shadowfell. It manifests in an unoccupied space you can see within range. The spirit uses the Shadow Spirit stat block. When you cast this spell, choose an emotion to embody: Fury, Despair, or Fear.
spells.at_higher_levels: For each slot level above 3rd, the creature's AC increases by 1, Hit Points increase by 10, and damage increases by 1d8.

spells.name: Summon Undead
spells.description: You call forth an undead spirit. It manifests in an unoccupied space you can see within range. The spirit uses the Undead Spirit stat block. When you cast this spell, choose the creature's form: Ghostly, Putrid, or Skeletal.
spells.at_higher_levels: For each slot level above 3rd, the creature's AC increases by 1, Hit Points increase by 10, and damage increases by 1d8.

spells.name: Thunder Step
spells.description: You teleport yourself to an unoccupied space you can see within range. Immediately after you disappear, a thunderous boom sounds, and each creature within 10 feet of the space you left must make a Constitution saving throw, taking 3d10 Thunder damage on a failed save, or half on a successful one. You can bring along objects as long as their weight doesn't exceed what you can carry. You can also teleport one willing creature of your size or smaller who is within 5 feet of you.
spells.at_higher_levels: The damage increases by 1d10 for each slot level above 3rd.

spells.name: Tidal Wave
spells.description: You conjure up a wave of water that crashes down on an area within range. The area can be up to 30 feet long, up to 10 feet wide, and up to 10 feet tall. Each creature in that area makes a Dexterity saving throw, taking 4d8 Bludgeoning damage on a failed save, or half as much on a success. The water spreads out across the ground, extinguishing unprotected flames and leaving the area as Difficult Terrain until the start of your next turn.

spells.name: Tiny Servant
spells.description: You touch one Tiny, nonmagical object that isn't attached to another object or a surface. The target animates and sprouts little arms and legs, becoming a creature under your control until the spell ends. It uses the Tiny Servant stat block.
spells.at_higher_levels: You can animate two additional objects for each slot level above 3rd.

spells.name: Tongues
spells.description: This spell grants the creature you touch the ability to understand any spoken or signed language that it hears or sees. Moreover, when the target communicates, any creature that knows at least one language can understand it if that creature can hear the target or see its signing.

spells.name: Vampiric Touch
spells.description: The touch of your shadow-wreathed hand can siphon life force from others. Make a melee spell attack against a creature within reach. On a hit, the target takes 3d6 Necrotic damage, and you regain Hit Points equal to half the Necrotic damage dealt. Until the spell ends, you can make the attack again on each of your turns as a Magic action.
spells.at_higher_levels: The damage increases by 1d6 for each slot level above 3rd.

spells.name: Wall of Water
spells.description: You create a wall of water on the ground at a point you can see. You can make the wall up to 30 feet long, 10 feet high, and 1 foot thick, or you can make a ringed wall up to 20 feet in diameter, 20 feet high, and 1 foot thick. The wall is difficult terrain. Ranged attacks that enter the wall's space have Disadvantage.

spells.name: Water Breathing
spells.description: This spell grants up to ten willing creatures within range the ability to breathe underwater until the spell ends. Affected creatures also retain their normal mode of respiration.

spells.name: Water Walk
spells.description: This spell grants the ability to move across any liquid surface—such as water, acid, mud, snow, quicksand, or lava—as if it were harmless solid ground. Up to ten willing creatures you can see within range gain this ability for the duration.

spells.name: Wind Wall
spells.description: A wall of strong wind rises from the ground at a point you choose. The wall is up to 50 feet long, 15 feet high, and 1 foot thick. When the wall appears, each creature in its area makes a Strength saving throw, taking 4d8 Bludgeoning damage on a failed save, or half as much on a success. The strong wind keeps fog, smoke, and other gases at bay. Small or smaller flying creatures or objects can't pass through the wall.
